reviews.sentence: Convenient. Convenient driving to my business meeting and convenient walking to KoP mall for wife to shop. Convenience and comfort. KoP Mall lots of restaurant choices.

Avg hotel. The service at this hotel was average and disappointing. I have stayed at several hotels in this area and that was the worst. The breakfast was poor and the cleanliness of the breakfast area was not good. The mattress felt like a water bed. Every time my husband moved I felt like I was going to roll off the bed.

I was here for a two night stay in late September. I checked in at just before midnight the first night and upon arriving in my room I found multiple items left in the refrigerator drinks takeout food etc. from whomever had stayed in the room prior to my arrival. I was in the area on business and was away from my room until 6 pm the next day. Not only was the refrigerator not cleaned out when I returned but the room had not been cleaned at all. There seemed to be plenty of employees at the hotel yet my room was not cleaned during the entirety of a 2 night stay. There is a Doubletree half a mile away and I will stay there from now on.

OK for one night. Ok for one night a little run down and needs some maintenance. Graffiti on elevator doors when they shut was disheartening and when I got to my hotel room door it seemed beat up and worn down. Once I got in the room it was relatively clean but dated. Room had small fridge. Get an even number room they are opposite side of major highway. Location is ok I walked to nearby mall which was close but still a walk. Plenty of parking no pool and gas station in front of hotel. If driving stay alert as entrance to hotel sneaks up on you Breakfast was ok if you wanted a quick bite. Tea and coffee available 247 which was nice. Staff was very friendly. I would stay again if I was in the area. I had a quiet stay and just needed to sleep so it was fine.

Business Trip KOP. Very average overall. Typical breakfast needs update offerings. Fresh fruits were not refilled and looked sad. It was icy that morning not the best job clearing the parking areas. Friendly staff overall it was okay.

Average All Around. The hotel is pretty clean. Comfortable beds. Looks like it was recently renovated. Elevator is slowest of all time and breakfast is very basic. Not bad what one would expect from a Hampton Inn. Location is near a highway so you can expect some road noise. Service is adequate.

Halfway decent place overall. Good location. Good wi fi. Negatives room had a bit of a bad smell to it carpet was coming up and cleaning service was shoddy at best. The last day we were there when we went to breakfast there were a huge rush of people and they could not keep up with the food supply.

Nice but Expensive. Nice hotel but expensive for the services provided. Breakfast was disappointing. Rooms are nice. Not a lot of quality dinner choices nearby. Room was old all night heater never really caught up on a cold night.

Horrible for a Hampton Inn. When we arrived the front door was half blocked with caution tape and a pole giving barely any room to enter. This lasted for 2 days. There was construction happening but it was loud grinding well into the evening hours well beyond anything reasonable. Lobby was frigid making breakfast unpleasant. No market to grab snacks or meds like other Hampton Inn. Breakfast was an after thought including one day when there was no syrup anywhere for waffles or oatmeal. HVAC controls in the guest room did nothing. Room would either be boiling hot or freezing cold. Parking lot was dark. Soda vending machine was empty but did not tell you this until it took your money and would not give back change. Toilet shoots dirty toilet water out of the bowl and onto the floor tub. No lid to prevent this. Staff is either not around or extremely understaffed.

Overall a nice stay. Need improvement on the breakfast area. The bed was very comfy it was clean and the staff was friendlyThe continental breakfast was a mess. The food was not ready the supplies and condiments were not replaced quickly. The garbages were overflowing. The breakfast was a complete fail.
Great room bad breakfast. The room was good and clean. Breakfast was not so good. The pancakes sausage was cold and the smoothies were warm. Cereal and pastries were stale.
Very Good. Staff was very friendly breakfast was very nice. Small window in our room and the blind was broken. So it was kinda dark in our room.

The stay was fantastic. The breakfast was fabulous each day. The handicapped facilities were very good although the bathroom door was strange. The driveway off of Dekelb Pike was easy to miss. We have stayed there previously so we did not miss it. The parking area was extremely adequate. The room accommodated the wheelchair well very spac. We never had a full set of towels. It would have been nice to have a comfortable chair aside from the desk chair so I could get out of the wheelchair.
Wonderful. Everything else was great. The room breakfast nice size tv. The pillows were a little small and uncomfortable. The bed was lumpy.

Great value. Excellent location for my business trip but the value was amazing. From the lobby to the complimentary breakfast to the rooms with an amazing bed and upgraded spotless bathroom I was blown away. Definitely recommend this Hampton. Staff was great.

The location of the hotel is fabulous. It ’s near a very nice mall and plenty of nice well know restaurants. Also very nice strip malls if the main mall is n’t what you ’re looking for. Near public transportation if you choose to us it at least it ’s available.

Great hotel. I stayed at that hotel late August. The staff was friendly and welcoming the rooms really clean the breakfast selection great. I enjoyed my stay. It is easy to find and close to many restaurants. Thanks.
Perfect shopping location. This hotel has very friendly staff. It is super clean and comfortable. Great proximity to KOP mall for Christmas shopping. The free breakfast is very nice too.

Hampton Inn King of Prussia. The hotel was clean. Breakfast was fine and staff was very friendly. Digital key worked and everything went smoothly. I am a Gold member and was treated as a Gold member. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Nice room good breakfast and very friendly staff.
